alert.note: Alert for Bollinger; Cape Girardeau (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 10:33PM CDT until July 12 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL BOLLINGER AND NORTHWESTERN CAPE GIRARDEAU COUNTIES... At 1032 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Daisy to near Grassy, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Marble Hill, Grassy, Oak Ridge, Whitewater, Zalma, Pocahontas and Glenallen. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 100 and 116. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
